dateplot1.title: kVA Ph1
dateplot1.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), value FROM dateplots_ups_b312 where type=251 and time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time

dateplot2.title: kVA Ph2
dateplot2.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), value FROM dateplots_ups_b312 where type=252 and time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time

dateplot3.title: kVA Ph3
dateplot3.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), value FROM dateplots_ups_b312 where type=253 and time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time

dateplot4.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), value FROM dateplots_ups_b312 where type=254 and time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time

dateplot5.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), value FROM dateplots_ups_b312 where type=255 and time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time

dateplot6.title: Iout Ph3
dateplot6.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), value FROM dateplots_ups_b312 where type=256 and time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time

dateplot7.title: Input Frequency
dateplot7.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), value FROM dateplots_ups_b312 where type=257 and time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time

dateplot8.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), value FROM dateplots_ups_b312 where type=258 and time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time

dateplot10.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), value FROM dateplots_ups_b312 where type=260 and time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time

dateplot11.title: Vout Ph1
dateplot11.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), value FROM dateplots_ups_b312 where type=261 and time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time

dateplot12.title: Vout Ph2
dateplot12.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), value FROM dateplots_ups_b312 where type=262 and time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time

dateplot13.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), value FROM dateplots_ups_b312 where type=263 and time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time

dateplot14.title: Battery Voltage
dateplot14.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), value FROM dateplots_ups_b312 where type=264 and time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time

dateplot15.title: Battery Current
dateplot15.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), value FROM dateplots_ups_b312 where type=265 and time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time

dateplot16.title: Battery Charge
dateplot16.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), value FROM dateplots_ups_b312 where type=266 and time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time

dateplot17.title: Output Frequency
dateplot17.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), value FROM dateplots_ups_b312 where type=267 and time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time

dateplot18.title: Temperature
dateplot18.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), value FROM dateplots_ups_b312 where type=250 and time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time

plot0.label: kVA / Ph1
plot0.old_data_query: select unix_timestamp(time), value from dateplots_ups_b312 where type=(SELECT id FROM dateplots_descriptions where codename="b312_ups_kVAPh1") and unix_timestamp(time) > {from}

plot1.label: kVA / Ph2
plot1.old_data_query: select unix_timestamp(time), value from dateplots_ups_b312 where type=(SELECT id FROM dateplots_descriptions where codename="b312_ups_kVAPh2") and unix_timestamp(time) > {from}

plot2.label: kVA / Ph3
plot2.old_data_query: select unix_timestamp(time), value from dateplots_ups_b312 where type=(SELECT id FROM dateplots_descriptions where codename="b312_ups_kVAPh3") and unix_timestamp(time) > {from}

plot0.label: Temperature / [C]
plot0.old_data_query: select unix_timestamp(time), value from dateplots_ups_b312 where type=(SELECT id FROM dateplots_descriptions where codename="b312_ups_battery_current") and unix_timestamp(time) > {from}
